question: Beti Bachao, Beti Padhao Yojana is implemented by which ministry?
option2: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
option3: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation: Beti Bachao Beti Padhao Yojana was started in 2015 to improve the quality of welfare schemes provided to girl babies. BBBP Yojana is jointly implemented by Ministry of Education, Ministry of Health and Family Welfare & Ministry of Women and Child Development.Â  "Save Girl Child" and "Educate Girl Child" are the key themes of this scheme
